info.title: About Hash Functions
info.description: Hash functions convert input data into fixed-size strings of characters, which are typically used for data integrity verification, password storage, and digital signatures.

security.title: Security Notes
items: MD5 and SHA-1 are deprecated for security use
Use SHA-256 or higher for cryptographic purposes
All hashing happens locally in your browser
No data is transmitted to external servers
